description: This file declares the interface for TCP-based inter-device management, including functions to open, send messages, and close remote connections. It includes necessary headers and contains function prototypes related to remote TCP communication.

methods.name: open_remote_connection
methods.description: Opens a remote TCP connection with specified configuration and callback functions.

methods.name: send_remote_message
methods.description: Sends a message over an established remote TCP connection.

methods.name: close_remote_connection
methods.description: Closes an existing remote TCP connection.
